subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Chicago Marathon
lead_paragraph: The Olympic gold medalist Joan Benoit Samuelson said she would run in the Chicago Marathon on Oct. 10, with hope of qualifying for the 2012 Olympic trials.
snippet: The Olympic gold medalist Joan Benoit Samuelson said she would run in the Chicago Marathon on Oct. 10, with hope of qualifying for the 2012 Olympic trials.
